about_the_game:
Diverse Management Challenges


Combine different ingredients to create a variety of vivid food and beverages, with hundreds of drink recipes, baking formulas, and cocktail mixes waiting for you to discover.
While serving customers, also pay attention to the needs of your feline staff so they can greet each customer with a joyful attitude.
In the future, we will also introduce staff recruitment and chain store management features, which means even busier days ahead!
Whether it’s the shop environment, food and beverages, employee service, or your working cats, every aspect relies on your careful management.

Stealth Rescues


Vigilance is a stray cat’s creed. The night not only camouflages them but serves as your perfect disguise.
Transform into a heroic Cat Crusader, using the cover of darkness to undertake stealth missions in the suburbs.
Employ strategy and finesse to rescue the unfortunate felines, but tread lightly to avoid startling them, as scared cats can be elusive.

Customization Fun


Decorate your café with a variety of furniture and décor to create a cozy atmosphere that attracts more cats and customers.
When the time is right, expand and upgrade to become the biggest cat café in the city!

Feline Interaction


Each cat has its own personality and preferences, from dietary habits to entertainment.
Mastering how to win their favor is an ongoing task.
Take good care of your cats and create a paradise they’ll love.

Breeding Wonders


Our unique breeding system lets you explore what adorable new life can arise from mixing different breeds and coat colors.
Start breeding your very own unique companions today!
When the cats are familiar enough with you and sufficiently mature, they will transform into Furries one night and continue to work and live with you as friends.




In "CatffeeTime!", every day is filled with new opportunities and challenges, allowing you to experience the joy of management in a fun and relaxed setting.
So, are you ready to start your cat café adventure?

Combine different ingredients to create a variety of vivid food and beverages, with hundreds of drink recipes, baking formulas, and cocktail mixes waiting for you to discover.

name: Catffee Time!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I5 - 8500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX - 1660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I7 - 4790
  • Graphics: GTX - 1070

short_description: By night, you're a stealthy rescuer saving stray cats in the suburbs; by day, a cat café owner, decorating, stocking up, and serving food. Dispatch unique cats to boost your rating and breed special breeds for competitions. Ready to make your café globally known?
